website_summaries.verdict: This is a unique looking reading pillow that is both aesthetically pleasing and highly functional, bringing comfort to those reading or looking to sit up.
pros: Unique design that’s functional and aesthetically pleasing
Long design allows pillow to act as a makeshift headboard
Removable cover is soft and washable
cons: Material may become staticky in certain weather conditions

customer_reviews.title: Really nice bolster
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in a queen size for my elderly Mom. It is very well made, light enough that she can move it herself (without too much struggle), really fits well side to side on the queen size bed, and a bonus: it can be turned many different ways to give her a straight-up sitting support, angled sitting-up support, and even turned longways to be more of a wedge-shaped laying-down support. The fabric is sturdy and the brighter green color makes her feel happy.
customer_reviews.author: AF

customer_reviews.title: Huge! very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: What can i say expect its huge! it fits all the way across a queen size mattress and its very comfortable for me and my wife it was well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle C.

customer_reviews.title: Very good value.
customer_reviews.text: Well made cover and cushion. Comfortable angle. Just the thing I needed for my futon couch. May get another (in blue) for my bed.
customer_reviews.author: E. A. Mccroskey

customer_reviews.title: As pictured.
customer_reviews.text: Makes sleep easier.My bed is against a wall on the floor with no frame, this makes my king bed feel much comfier.Color is correct also.
customer_reviews.author: Margarita

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: The wedge made a big difference in the looks of our bed and room, it’s luxurious looking now eventhough our mattress is just on the floor (Life with a tot 🤪) and more cozy, and the color has brighten up our bedroom. It’s also very useful as back support when we’re watching. The packaging though is not nice but overall, purchasing this is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Amazing love it, and can hold my chubby cats weight and then bounce right back
customer_reviews.author: Mondea

customer_reviews.title: Supportive and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: So I got this pillow because I spend a lot of time sitting up and reading in my bed, and regular big pillows in shams weren’t the greatest for support. We don’t really have a traditional headboard and that doesn’t help either. When this came, I was a bit intimidated by how huge it is! But it’s working wonderfully! Really supportive and very comfortable! I did make a new cover for it, the khaki green corduroy is pretty atrocious. But it’s a great purchase overall and I am glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Rose

customer_reviews.title: Used as Headboard
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. The color is bright green moss (what some might call "new green). I would not say it is neon. Washed the covered for the first time, yesterday, and had no problem putting the cover back on. The buttons do not come off, so you do have to unbutton when removing the cover and button when putting the cover back on, but, again, it was not difficult, at all. I would say my wedge headboard/pillow looks even better. Washed on gentle, without bleach, and air dried. I recommend this purchase. :-)
customer_reviews.author: CPerry

customer_reviews.title: Awesome support pillow
customer_reviews.text: The color is perfect. The fabric is soft. It fits my queen bed perfectly. Supports me well for sitting up in bed.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Young

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Love this for my kiddo’s bed, to keep him from crawling between the head of the mattress and the wall. It does have a strong smell for two days after coming out of the packaging, but it faded within a week.
customer_reviews.author: Minnifrid

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!!
customer_reviews.text: This is SO Nice & Made Very Well. I’m using this as a Headboard for a Queen Bed in our Camper. Totally Recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary L

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded my expectations, fits my daybed like a dream (got the largest size). So happy with it, firm, great quality, packaged nicely and came really fast!!
customer_reviews.author: sQuid

customer_reviews.title: and it's comfortable to lean against
customer_reviews.text: This by far exceeded my expectations. Not only added a splash of color, but also a bit of elegance to my room. Oh yeah, and it's comfortable to lean against.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Rees

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is bigger than I excepted it to be (which is a good thing) and it fits my very deep seated joybird couch perfectly!! Sometimes I don't want to be sitting so far back and this pillow is PERFECT!! And when I don't want to use it, sits on the back of the couch nicely. Great purchase!! Oh...it will come in a bizarre package...looked like a white grain bag, vacuumed down so will look smaller than it is.
customer_reviews.author: K. Wilson
